Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package curl for versions less than 7.86.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package curl for versions less than 7.86.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 7.86.0-3, affected by CVE-2022-43552
